summary: DOOR LOCKS KEEP POPPING OPEN OR SHUT MANY TIMES PER DAY.  SOMETIMES WHEN PARKED, OTHER TIMES WHEN DRIVING.  THIS HAS BEEN GOING ON FOR OVER A YEAR.  EACH TIME I TAKE TO THE DEALER, HE SAYS HE CAN'T FIND THE REASON.  TOYOTA HAS NO CLUE ON WHY THIS ELECTRICAL PROBLEM EXISTS.  I CAN'T LEAVE ANYTHING IN THE CAR, BECAUSE WHEN I RETURN THE LOCKS ARE UP.*AK
